text: Zou Yixin or Chou Yi-Hsin (1911–1997) was a Chinese astronomer, who has been called "the first female astronomer in China".Xiangqun Cui, Women in Astronomy in China. Accessed 24 October 2018. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Chinese women astronomers Category:Sun Yat-sen University alumni Category:Sun Yat-sen University faculty
title: Zou Yixin
